column2: PWB- Toosdai Critters: Sea of Love
column5: Do you remember when we met? That's the day I knew you were my pet I wanna tell you how much I love you  Come with me my love To the sea the sea of love I want to tell you just how much I love you pic.twitter.com/Oa9ySBdeD9  Happy first birthday to DLC heartthrob Brady (named after @tombrady) Blue-eyed black lemurs are among the most endangered primates in the world Brady & his parents were born through @DukeLemurCenter's conservation breeding program forming a genetic safety net for their species pic.twitter.com/HcUMb5qeQ2  Come with me to the sea of love Do you remember when we met   pic.twitter.com/oR0xHbZ4NX  That's the day I knew you were my pet I want to tell you oh how much I love you  Binturongs don’t understand personal space pic.twitter.com/YRza9HPe7T  Come with me to the sea of love Come with me my love  pic.twitter.com/dyNjhkSJGD  To the sea the sea of love I want to tell you just how much I love you  Do you ever look at your dog or cat or a bird flying by the window and wonder: “What exactly are you thinking?”  https://t.co/ePBwOmzCMl  I want to tell you oh how much I love you  pic.twitter.com/rJxTcdj2bI
